snippet: Lawmakers proposed the creation of the state’s 12th university and a $1 billion increase for primary and high schools, but the budget also cuts $300 million from universities and colleges.
abstract: Florida lawmakers propose $70 billion budget that would create the state's 12th university and provide $1 billion increase for primary and high schools, but also cuts $300 million from universities and colleges.
lead_paragraph: Lawmakers proposed the creation of the state’s 12th university and a $1 billion increase for primary and high schools, but the budget also cuts $300 million from universities and colleges.

headline.seo: Florida Higher Education May Face Big Budget Cuts
headline.main: Florida Higher Education May Face Big Budget Cuts
headline.print_headline: Florida Higher Education May Face Big Budget Cuts
